title: Getting started
text: maintained International Classification Diseases (ICD) recording causes death since 1893. updated ICD periodically reflect new discoveries epidemiology changes medical understanding disease. CMS contracted 3M Health Information Systems 1993 design develop procedural classification system replace Volume 3 ICD-9-CM. ICD-10-PCS initially released 1998 updated annually. process constructing codes ICD-10-PCS logical consistent. Individual letters numbers, called values, selected sequence occupy seven spaces code, called characters.

title: Getting started
text: ICD-10-PCS code best understood result process rather assigned number. codes ICD-10-PCS seven characters long. character represents aspect procedure, shown following diagram characters main section ICD-10-PCS, Medical Surgical:

title: Getting started
text: One 34 possible values can assigned character code: integers 0–9 alphabet (except O, easily confused numbers 1 0). finished code looks like example . 02103D4 Bypass coronary artery, one artery coronary vein intraluminal device, percutaneous approach Choosing specific value seven characters derives code. Based details procedure performed, values character specifying section, body system, root operation, body part, approach, device, qualifier assigned. definition character function actual physical position code, value placed different position code means something totally different.
code: x <- pcs("02103D4") x$axes |> gt(rowname_col = "axis") |> opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |> cols_align(align = "center", columns = c(axis, value)) |> tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", alpha = 0.5), cell_text(weight = "bold")), locations = cells_body(columns = value)) |> opt_all_caps() |> opt_table_outline(style = "none") |> tab_header(title = html("ICD-10-PCS 2024"), subtitle = html(paste0("", x$code, ": ", x$description))) |> tab_footnote( footnote = html(paste0("Definition: ", procedural:::delister(x$definitions[1, 6]))), locations = cells_body(columns = label, rows = 3)) |> tab_footnote( footnote = html(paste0("Definition: ", procedural:::delister(x$definitions[2, 6]))), locations = cells_body(columns = label, rows = 5)) |> tab_options( table.width = pct(55), heading.title.font.size = px(18), heading.subtitle.font.size = px(14), heading.align = "left", table.font.color = "#0B0B45", footnotes.font.size = px(12), column_labels.hidden = TRUE)

title: Getting started
text: ICD-10-PCS composed 17 sections, represented numbers 0-9 letters B-D, F-H X. machinery PCS contained three parts: Index, Tables, List Codes. Additionally, Appendices contain information structure code set definitions values used code. also list guidelines ICD-10-PCS code book instruct use PCS code set.

title: Getting started
text: first section, Medical Surgical, contains majority procedures typically reported inpatient setting. Coding Example example describes excision dorsal ganglion located wrist level. PCS code built selecting appropriate characters describe intent, approach, qualifying information procedure performed. Note: purpose ICD-10-PCS code explain purpose procedure using every character describe way procedure performed. Operative Report: Excision Dorsal Ganglion, Right Wrist patient adequate anesthesia, right upper extremity prepped draped sterile manner. arm exsanguinated tourniquet elevated 290 mm/Hg. transverse incision made dorsal ganglion. Using blunt dissection dorsal ulnar sensory nerve branches radial sensory nerve branches dissected retracted operative field. extensor tendon incised, dissected, retracted operative field. ganglion dissected origin dorsal distal scapholunate interosseus ligament excised. Care taken protect ligament integrity. wound infiltrated 0.25% Marcaine. tendons allowed resume normal anatomical position. skin closed 3-0 Prolene subcuticular stitch. Sterile dressings applied. tourniquet deflated. Section 0 Medical Surgical Body System L Tendons (Extensor tendon) Root Operation B Excision (tendon excised removed) Body Part 5 Lower Arm, Wrist, Right (extensor tendon located wrist level) Approach 0 Open (incision performed blunt dissection carried layers tissue expose site) Device Z Device Qualifier Z Qualifier
code: x <- pcs("0LB50ZX") x$axes |> gt(rowname_col = "axis") |> opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |> cols_align(align = "center", columns = c(axis, value)) |> tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", alpha = 0.5), cell_text(weight = "bold")), locations = cells_body(columns = value)) |> opt_all_caps() |> tab_header(title = html("ICD-10-PCS 2024"), subtitle = html(paste0("", x$code, ": ", x$description))) |> tab_footnote( footnote = html(paste0("Definition: ", procedural:::delister(x$definitions[1, 6]))), locations = cells_body(columns = label, rows = 3)) |> tab_footnote( footnote = html(paste0("Definition: ", procedural:::delister(x$definitions[2, 6]))), locations = cells_body(columns = label, rows = 5)) |> tab_options( table.width = pct(55), heading.title.font.size = px(20), heading.subtitle.font.size = px(14), heading.align = "left", table.font.color = "#0B0B45", footnotes.font.size = px(12), column_labels.hidden = TRUE)

title: Getting started
text: Sections 0-9 ICD-10-PCS comprise Medical Surgical Related sections. sections include obstetrical procedures, administration substances, measurement monitoring body functions, extracorporeal therapies, listed table . sections 0, 1, 2, seven characters define aspects procedure. Sections 3-9 differ slightly. example, sections 5 6, 5th character defined Duration instead Approach, code Intra-aortic Balloon Pump (IABP): Additional differences include uses 6th character: Section 3 defines 6th character Substance. Sections 4 - 5 define Function. Sections 7 - 9 define Method.
code: #> Error in sections(0:9): could not find function "sections" x <- pcs("5A02210") x$axes |> gt(rowname_col = "axis") |> opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |> cols_align(align = "center", columns = c(axis, value)) |> tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", alpha = 0.5), cell_text(weight = "bold")), locations = cells_body(columns = value)) |> opt_all_caps() |> tab_header(title = html("ICD-10-PCS 2024"), subtitle = html(paste0("", x$code, ": ", x$description))) |> tab_options( table.width = pct(55), heading.title.font.size = px(20), heading.subtitle.font.size = px(14), heading.align = "left", table.font.color = "#0B0B45", footnotes.font.size = px(12))

previous_headings: Overview > Medical and Surgical Related Sections
title: Getting started
text: Sections B - D F - H comprise ancillary sections: definitions characters ancillary sections differ seen previous sections. Imaging section, 3rd character defined root type, 5th 6th characters define contrast contrast/qualifier respectively, CT scan example . coding CT scans, documentation must support components proper selection ICD-10-PCS code. section first character come Imaging section. body system based area examined. root type determined type imaging (CT, MRI, X-ray). body part selected determining specific body area analyzed procedure. contrast character used determine high osmolar, low osmolar, type contrast used, applicable. qualifier character used specify enhanced unenhanced images taken. Example: CT scan brain > Technique: 2.5 mm thick axial images obtained head diatrizoate (high osmolar contrast). > 0.625 mm thick axial images well coronal sagittal enhanced images also submitted interpretation. Findings: > intra- extra-axial blood fluid collection present. mass shift midline. Brain densities normal. > ventricles sulci normal size configuration. Vascular structures normal appearance. pituitary, orbits, > paranasal sinuses unremarkable. calvarium intact. Additional differences include: Section C defines 5th character Radionuclide. Section D defines 5th character Modality Qualifier 6th character Isotope. Section F defines 5th character Type Qualifier 6th character Equipment. Sections G H define 3rd character Root Type qualifier. Section X defines 7th character New Technology Group. letter changes year new technology codes added system. example, Section X codes added first year 7th character value 1, New Technology Group 1. next year contains new Section X codes 7th character value 2, New Technology Group 2, etc.
code: #> Error in sections(c("B", "C", "D", "F", "G", "H", "X")): could not find function "sections" x <- pcs("B02000Z") x$axes |> gt(rowname_col = "axis") |> opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |> cols_align(align = "center", columns = c(axis, value)) |> tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", alpha = 0.5), cell_text(weight = "bold")), locations = cells_body(columns = value)) |> opt_all_caps() |> tab_header(title = html("ICD-10-PCS 2024"), subtitle = html(paste0("", x$code, ": ", x$description))) |> tab_options( table.width = pct(55), heading.title.font.size = px(20), heading.subtitle.font.size = px(14), heading.align = "left", table.font.color = "#0B0B45", footnotes.font.size = px(12))

title: Getting started
text: ICD-10-PCS Index can used access Tables. Index mirrors structure Tables, follows consistent pattern organization use hierarchies.

title: Getting started
text: Index organized alphabetic lookup. Two types main terms listed Index: Based value 3rd character Common procedure terms Medical Surgical Related sections, root operation values used main terms Index. sections, values representing general type procedure performed, nuclear medicine imaging type, listed main terms. Medical Surgical Related sections, values excision, bypass, transplantation included main terms index. applicable body system entries listed beneath main term refer specific table. ancillary sections, values fluoroscopy positron emission tomography listed main terms. index entry Bypass refers Medical Surgical section tables applicable body systems, including anatomical regions central nervous system: Peritoneal Cavity 0W1G Spinal Canal 001U Body System listings may followed entries specific body parts: Artery Left 08133 Right 08123 Left 03160 Right 03150 Left 03180 Right 03170 Left 031J0 Right 031H0 root operations change, insertion, removal, revision, device entries defined body part device inserted /.

title: Getting started
text: second type term listed Index uses procedure names, “appendectomy” “fundoplication”. entries listed main terms, refer table tables valid code can constructed, shown following example: see Excision, Gallbladder 0FB4 see Resection, Gallbladder 0FT4 two root operations listed procedure, must study operative report determine root operation documented purpose procedure. example, excision means cut portion body part, resection means cut body part. gallbladder removed, code resection gallbladder.

title: Getting started
text: Tables organized series, beginning section 0, medical surgical, body system 0, central nervous, proceeding numerical order. Sections 0-9 followed sections B-D F-H. convention followed within table second 7th characters — numeric values order first, followed alphabetical values order. following examples use Medical Surgical section describe organization format ICD-10-PCS tables. Medical Surgical section (1st character 0) organized 31 body system values. body system subdivision Medical Surgical section contains introductory table lists possible values remaining characters, given body system. Tables section used construct complete valid codes. Based first three values code provided Index, corresponding table can located. tables characters arranged number, letter character. root operation tables consist four columns varying number rows, following example root operation Bypass, Central Nervous body system. Section Body System Root Operation operative report describe ventriculoperitoneal (VP) shunt placement. purpose VP shunt valve placed head, one catheter placed cerebral ventricle end peritoneal cavity. Patients require VP shunt tend diagnosed hydrocephalus, condition accumulation cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) ventricles. shunt removes accumulated fluid brain peritoneal cavity. Operative Report: VP shunt placement first incision made level frontal area, coagulation used control bleeding. , another incision made level abdominal wall, using tunneler, peritoneal catheter passed abdominal wall posterior parietal, small incision also made right frontal area. catheter primed, catheter used Bactiseal. , programmable valve set 180 mm water connected peritoneal catheter. point, using previous bur hole, Bactiseal ventricular catheter soft passed ventricle connected programmable valve. areas connection verified. , peritoneal catheter inserted peritoneal cavity, dissected layers starting rectus muscle peritoneum. catheter introduced peritoneal cavity verification dripping CSF. 00160J6 Bypass cerebral ventricle peritoneal cavity synthetic substitute, open approach reviewing description ICD-10-PCS code, notice intent procedure described root operation bypass, defined altering route passage contents tubular body part. highlighted keywords help determine proper selection code, example, procedure required incision frontal area abdominal wall able insert catheter. justify character “open” approach. values characters 1-3 provided top table. Four columns contain applicable values characters 4-7, given values characters 1-3. table may separated rows specify valid choices values characters 4-7. code built using values one row table valid code. table , five choices 7th character Body Part, U, Spinal Canal. can’t cross line choose 7th character row . many tables ICD-10-PCS besides tables used construct codes. appendices ICD-10-PCS code book contain many helpful tables. Appendix contains table defines root operations ICD-10-PCS code book. lists definition, also explanation example(s) root operation. root operations listed character value, numeric order, followed alphabetical order. example, Root Operations - Alteration listed Definition, Explanation, Examples face lift breast augmentation. Appendix B Body Part Key. helpful tool help match specific body part descriptor ICD-10-PCS. listed alphabetic order. Appendix C Device Key. Similar body part key, matches device descriptor ICD-10-PCS. example, Brachytherapy seeds leads Radioactive Element. Appendix D Device Aggregation Table. table crosswalks specific device character value definitions specific root operation specific body system general device character value used. example, specific device Autologous Arterial Tissue, applicable operations heart great vessels, lower arteries, lower veins, upper arteries, upper veins leads General Device 7 Autologous Tissue Substitute. Appendix E contains Character Meanings tables. gives overview codes entire system one place. following example shows introductory table Urinary system. following example shows introductory table urinary system. Table 3. Introductory table values Medical Surgical section urinary body system (characters 3-7) 0: Medical Surgical T: Urinary System Appendix F contains Substance Key. table provides substance term corresponding ICD-10-PCS Value. example, Seprafilm® ICD-10-PCS Value adhesion barrier. Appendix G contains Combination Clusters. table used codes require one ICD-10-PCS procedure code correct reporting. example provided insertion cardiac pacemaker lead coronary vein. additional procedures describe exact location lead inserted, required correct reporting. instructions Appendix specify first code cluster needs reported one additional codes listed codes considered valid. example listed , codes listed insertion cardiac resynchronization pacemaker pulse generator insertion three leads. Code many additional codes documented operative report. 02H40JZ Insertion pacemaker lead coronary vein, open approach 02H60JZ Insertion pacemaker lead right atrium, open approach 02HK0JZ Insertion pacemaker lead right ventricle, open approach 0JH607Z Insertion cardiac resynchronization pacemaker pulse generator chest subcutaneous tissue fascia, open approach Appendix H contains Non-Affecting MS-DRG Assignment codes.

title: Getting started
text: PCS codes composed seven alphanumeric characters. character contains 34 possible values. seven characters make complete code specific meanings vary 17 sections manual. value represents specific option general character definition. 10 digits (0-9) 24 letters (-H, J-N, P-Z) may used character. letters O used avoid confusion digits 0 1.

title: Getting started
text: character axis classification specifies information procedure performed. Within defined code range, character specifies type information axis classification. example, fifth axis classification specifies Approach sections 0 4 7 9 system.

title: Getting started
code: x <- pcs("0016070") x$axes |> gt(rowname_col = "axis") |> opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |> cols_align(align = "center", columns = c(axis, value)) |> tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", alpha = 0.5), cell_text(weight = "bold")), locations = cells_body(columns = value)) |> opt_all_caps() |> tab_header(title = html("ICD-10-PCS 2024"), subtitle = html(paste0("", x$code, ": ", x$description))) |> tab_footnote( footnote = html(paste0("Definition: ", procedural:::delister(x$definitions[1, 6]))), locations = cells_body(columns = label, rows = 3)) |> tab_footnote( footnote = html(paste("Includes:", procedural:::delister(x$includes[1, 5]))), locations = cells_body(columns = label, rows = 4)) |> tab_footnote( footnote = html(paste0("Definition: ", procedural:::delister(x$definitions[2, 6]))), locations = cells_body(columns = label, rows = 5)) |> tab_options( table.width = pct(55), heading.title.font.size = px(20), heading.subtitle.font.size = px(14), heading.align = "left", table.font.color = "#0B0B45", footnotes.font.size = px(12))

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
text: goal procedural provide set tools working 2024 ICD-10-PCS procedure classification system.

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
text: can install procedural GitHub :
code: # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("andrewallenbruce/procedural")

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
text: ICD-10-PCS, International Classification Diseases, 10th Revision, Procedure Coding System, procedure classification system used code procedures performed hospital inpatient health care settings.
code: library(procedural)

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
code: pcs("0LQV3ZZ") # Medical and Surgical #> $code #> [1] "0LQV3ZZ" #>  #> $description #> [1] "Repair Right Foot Tendon, Percutaneous Approach" #>  #> $axes #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   axis  name        value label                #>   <chr> <chr>       <chr> <chr>                #> 1 1     Section     0     Medical and Surgical #> 2 2     Body System L     Tendons              #> 3 3     Operation   Q     Repair               #> 4 4     Body Part   V     Foot Tendon, Right   #> 5 5     Approach    3     Percutaneous         #> 6 6     Device      Z     No Device            #> 7 7     Qualifier   Z     No Qualifier         #>  #> $definitions #> # A tibble: 2 × 6 #>   section axis  name      value label        definition                          #>   <chr>   <chr> <chr>     <chr> <chr>        <chr>                               #> 1 0       3     Operation Q     Repair       Restoring, to the extent possible,… #> 2 0       5     Approach  3     Percutaneous Entry, by puncture or minor incisi… #>  #> $includes #> [1] NA pcs("0G9000Z") # Medical and Surgical #> $code #> [1] "0G9000Z" #>  #> $description #> [1] "Drainage of Pituitary Gland with Drainage Device, Open Approach" #>  #> $axes #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   axis  name        value label                #>   <chr> <chr>       <chr> <chr>                #> 1 1     Section     0     Medical and Surgical #> 2 2     Body System G     Endocrine System     #> 3 3     Operation   9     Drainage             #> 4 4     Body Part   0     Pituitary Gland      #> 5 5     Approach    0     Open                 #> 6 6     Device      0     Drainage Device      #> 7 7     Qualifier   Z     No Qualifier         #>  #> $definitions #> # Placement #> $code #> [1] "2W0UX0Z" #>  #> $description #> [1] "Change Traction Apparatus on Right Toe" #>  #> $axes #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   axis  name        value label              #>   <chr> <chr>       <chr> <chr>              #> 1 1     Section     2     Placement          #> 2 2     Body System W     Anatomical Regions #> 3 3     Operation   0     Change             #> 4 4     Body Region U     Toe, Right         #> 5 5     Approach    X     External           #> 6 6     Device      0     Traction Apparatus #> 7 7     Qualifier   Z     No Qualifier       #>  #> $definitions #> # A tibble: 2 × 6 #>   section axis  name      value label        definition                          #>   <chr>   <chr> <chr>     <chr> <chr>        <chr>                               #> 1 9       3     Operation B     Manipulation Manual procedure that involves a d… #> 2 9       5     Approach  X     External     Procedures performed directly on t… #>  #> $includes #> [1] NA pcs("B00B0ZZ") # Imaging #> $code #> [1] "B00B0ZZ" #>  #> $description #> [1] "Plain Radiography of Spinal Cord using High Osmolar Contrast" #>  #> $axes #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   axis  name        value label                  #>   <chr> <chr>       <chr> <chr>                  #> 1 1     Section     B     Imaging                #> 2 2     Body System 0     Central Nervous System #> 3 3     Type        0     Plain Radiography      #> 4 4     Body Part   B     Spinal Cord            #> 5 5     Contrast    0     High Osmolar           #> 6 6     Qualifier   Z     None                   #> 7 7     Qualifier   Z     None                   #>  #> $definitions #> [1] NA #>  #> $includes #> [1] NA pcs("C0101ZZ") # Nuclear Medicine #> $code #> [1] "C0101ZZ" #>  #> $description #> [1] "Planar Nuclear Medicine Imaging of Brain using Technetium 99m (Tc-99m)" #>  #> $axes #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   axis  name         value label                           #>   <chr> <chr>        <chr> <chr>                           #> 1 1     Section      C     Nuclear Medicine                #> 2 2     Body System  0     Central Nervous System          #> 3 3     Type         1     Planar Nuclear Medicine Imaging #> 4 4     Body Part    0     Brain                           #> 5 5     Radionuclide 1     Technetium 99m (Tc-99m)         #> 6 6     Qualifier    Z     None                            #> 7 7     Qualifier    Z     None                            #>  #> $definitions #> [1] NA #>  #> $includes #> [1] NA pcs("DG22DZZ") # Radiation Therapy #> $code #> [1] "DG22DZZ" #>  #> $description #> [1] "Stereotactic Other Photon Radiosurgery of Adrenal Glands" #>  #> $axes #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   axis  name               value label                                  #>   <chr> <chr>              <chr> <chr>                                  #> 1 1     Section            D     Radiation Therapy                      #> 2 2     Body System        G     Endocrine System                       #> 3 3     Modality           2     Stereotactic Radiosurgery              #> 4 4     Treatment Site     2     Adrenal Glands                         #> 5 5     Modality Qualifier D     Stereotactic Other Photon Radiosurgery #> 6 6     Isotope            Z     None                                   #> 7 7     Qualifier          Z     None                                   #>  #> $definitions #> [1] NA #>  #> $includes #> [1] NA pcs("F14Z01Z") # Physical Rehabilitation and Diagnostic Audiology #> $code #> [1] "F14Z01Z" #>  #> $description #> [1] "Cochlear Implant Assessment using Audiometer" #>  #> $axes #> # A tibble: 7 × 4 #>   axis  name                 value label                                         #>   <chr> <chr>                <chr> <chr>                                         #> 1 1     Section              F     Physical Rehabilitation and Diagnostic Audio… #> 2 2     Section Qualifier    1     Diagnostic Audiology                          #> 3 3     Type                 4     Hearing Aid Assessment                        #> 4 4     Body System / Region Z     None                                          #> 5 5     Type Qualifier       0     Cochlear Implant                              #> 6 6     Equipment            1     Audiometer                                    #> 7 7     Qualifier            Z     None                                          #>  #> $definitions #> # A tibble: 10 × 6 #>    section axis  name           value label                           definition #>    <chr>   <chr> <chr>          <chr> <chr>                           <chr>      #>  1 F       3     Type           4     Hearing Aid Assessment          Measureme… #>  2 F       5     Type Qualifier 0     Bathing/Showering Techniques    Activitie… #>  3 F       5     Type Qualifier 0     Bithermal, Binaural Caloric Ir… Measures … #>  4 F       5     Type Qualifier 0     Cochlear Implant                Measures … #>  5 F       5     Type Qualifier 0     Cochlear Implant Rehabilitation Applying … #>  6 F       5     Type Qualifier 0     Filtered Speech                 Uses high… #>  7 F       5     Type Qualifier 0     Hearing and Related Disorders … Provides … #>  8 F       5     Type Qualifier 0     Hearing Screening               Pass/refe… #>  9 F       5     Type Qualifier 0     Range of Motion and Joint Mobi… Exercise … #> 10 F       5     Type Qualifier 0     Vestibular                      Applying … #>  #> $includes #> [1] NA pcs("GZ10ZZZ") # title: Return a range of ICD-10-PCS codes. — code_range

text: start 7-character ICD-10-PCS code. end 7-character ICD-10-PCS code.

text: dplyr::tibble()

title: Return a range of ICD-10-PCS codes. — code_range
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() code_range("0G9000Z", "0G9100Z")  code_range("0G9000Z", "10D20ZZ") }

title: ICD-10-PCS Definitions — definitions
text: ICD-10-PCS Definitions

title: ICD-10-PCS Definitions — definitions
code: definitions(   section = NULL,   axis = NULL,   col = c("value", "label", "name", "definition", "explanation"),   search = NULL )

title: ICD-10-PCS Definitions — definitions
text: section PCS section character. axis PCS axis position. col column search: "name", "value" (default), "label" "definition", "explanation" search string search col

text: dplyr::tibble()
